text: Does anyone know about a reliable source of weather forecasts for e.g. 7 days from today? Pretty much all somewhat mainstream applications for that sort of thing are.. hard to like, I much prefer output in the form of graphs and such (like e.g. from `curl <http://v2.wttr.in|v2.wttr.in>`, only that is limited to 2 days from now)

text: <http://yr.no|yr.no> is well respected in Europe. They have nice graphs like <https://www.yr.no/en/forecast/graph/2-2643743/United%20Kingdom/England/Greater%20London/London|https://www.yr.no/en/forecast/graph/2-2643743/United%20Kingdom/England/Greater%20London/London>
